failures.remediation:
Modify your image configuration and set the default user to other than root
Check the documentation to learn why and how to change the default image user

rules.description: Severity greater than or equal critical AND Fixable since 30 days AND Disclosure date older than or equal 60 days AND Public Exploit available since 30 days AND No administrative privileges required AND Network attack vector
Vulnerabilities Deny List: CVE-2022-22963, CVE-2021-44832, CVE-2017-8046
Forbid sensitive information and secrets in the image metadata

failures.remediation:
Environment variable True does not exists
Add environment variable True to image config

rules.description: Severity greater than or equal high AND Network attack vector AND Fixable
Severity equal high AND Fixable since 30 days
Severity greater than or equal critical AND Public Exploit available AND No User interaction required
Severity greater than or equal critical AND Fixable since 30 days AND Public Exploit available
